General.Name: Cury Construtora e Incorporadora S.A
General.Description: Cury Construtora e Incorporadora S.A. operates in real estate businesses. The company develops and rents residential real estate properties; provides services related to construction, supervision, studies, and projects; and offers civil engineering works. It also provides real estate agency and brokerage services. The company was founded in 1963 and is based in São Paulo, Brazil.
General.Address: Rua Funchal, 411, São Paulo, SP, Brazil, 04551-060
